text:
Human activity recognition aims to infer the actions of one or more persons from a set
of observations captured by sensors. Usually, this is performed by following a ﬁxed
length sliding window approach for the features extraction where two parameters
have to be ﬁxed: the size of the window and the shift.
— A Dynamic Sliding Window Approach for Activity Recognition , 2011.
